eu_initiatives:
Cybersecurity Strategy and Digital Single Market Strategy 
 
 CyCSO is already member of the Digital Skills Alliance of the European Commission and its Executive Director has been invited recently at the High Level working group for Cybersecurity organized by the DG Connect in March.  
Furthermore the CyCSO Executive Director is invited as an expert to the Digital Skills project building the digital skills for SMEs project, funded by the European Commission.
